gw.api.rest.schema

Interface IRestSchemaWriterPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IRestSchemaWriterPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The IRestSchemaWriterPlugin allows for modifying the JSON Schema definitions and properties that get written out as part of the swagger.json endpoint for a REST API or when running the genExternalSchemas task from the command line.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @Nullable JsonObject getDefinitionSchemaModifications(@NotNull JsonSchemaDefinition definition, @Nullable java.lang.String apiFqn)
      This method will be invoked for every JsonSchemaDefinition that is being written into the externalized JSON Schema or Swagger schema.
      @Nullable JsonObject getItemsSchemaModifications(@NotNull JsonSchemaItems items, @Nullable java.lang.String apiFqn)
      This method will be invoked for every array that is being written into the externalized JSON Schema or Swagger schema.
      @Nullable JsonObject getPropertySchemaModifications(@NotNull JsonSchemaProperty prop, @Nullable java.lang.String apiFqn)
      This method will be invoked for every JsonSchemaProperty that is being written into the externalized JSON Schema or Swagger schema.

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertySchemaModifications

        @Nullable
@Nullable JsonObject getPropertySchemaModifications(@NotNull
                                                              @NotNull JsonSchemaProperty prop,
                                                              @Nullable
                                                              @Nullable java.lang.String apiFqn)
        This method will be invoked for every JsonSchemaProperty that is being written into the externalized JSON Schema or Swagger schema. The returned JsonObject can be used to add additional properties to the schema output for the property, or to override the values of properties. Implementers of this method should be careful to ensure that the resulting output is still a valid JSON Schema document.
        Parameters:
        prop - The JsonSchemaProperty that is being written out
        apiFqn - An optional parameter that will be passed if this method is being called in the context of constructing a particular Swagger schema. If so, it will include the fully-qualified name of the API that Swagger schema is being built for.
        Returns:
        A JsonObject that will be merged with the schema being written out for the specified property, or null to leave the output as-is for this property

      • getDefinitionSchemaModifications

        @Nullable
@Nullable JsonObject getDefinitionSchemaModifications(@NotNull
                                                                @NotNull JsonSchemaDefinition definition,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                @Nullable java.lang.String apiFqn)
        This method will be invoked for every JsonSchemaDefinition that is being written into the externalized JSON Schema or Swagger schema. The returned JsonObject can be used to add additional properties to the schema output for the definition, or to override the values of properties. Implementers of this method should be careful to ensure that the resulting output is still a valid JSON Schema document.
        Parameters:
        definition - The JsonSchemaDefinition that is being written out
        apiFqn - An optional parameter that will be passed if this method is being called in the context of constructing a particular Swagger schema. If so, it will include the fully-qualified name of the API that Swagger schema is being built for.
        Returns:
        A JsonObject that will be merged with the schema being written out for the specified definition, or null to leave the output as-is for this property

      • getItemsSchemaModifications

        @Nullable
@Nullable JsonObject getItemsSchemaModifications(@NotNull
                                                           @NotNull JsonSchemaItems items,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           @Nullable java.lang.String apiFqn)
        This method will be invoked for every array that is being written into the externalized JSON Schema or Swagger schema. The returned JsonObject can be used to add additional properties to the schema output for the array, or to override the values of properties. Implementers of this method should be careful to ensure that the resulting output is still a valid JSON Schema document.
        Parameters:
        items - The JsonSchemaItems of the array that is being written out
        apiFqn - An optional parameter that will be passed if this method is being called in the context of constructing a particular Swagger schema. If so, it will include the fully-qualified name of the API that Swagger schema is being built for.
        Returns:
        A JsonObject that will be merged with the schema being written out for the specified array, or null to leave the output as-is for this array
